segments.text: I'd like to buy a tapestry to decorate my new room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Artistic tapestry is the highest expression form of the rug weaving art . How about these ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These are beautiful ! Is this the marvelous landscape in Guiling ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How fine the needlework is ! What's the price ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But considering the fine craftsmanship it is worth much more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . Would you please show me some embroidery ? I also want to buy some embroidered tablecloths to match the tapestry .
segments.speaker: S2
